setSegmentPause

public void setSegmentPause(javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem segmentPause)
Set the source checkbox used to determine if there should be a pause between segments.

Parameters:
segmentPause - The source checkbox used to determine if there should be a pause. This is a checkbox rather than a boolean so it can be changed on the fly.

Parameters:

getTotalDistanceMoved

public double getTotalDistanceMoved()
The total distance moved is the total distance extruded plus plus additional movements of the extruder when no materials was deposited

Returns:
total distance the extruder has moved

getTotalDistanceExtruded

public double getTotalDistanceExtruded()
Returns:
total distance that has been extruded in millimeters
